name: df-nmhm
body: |- wceq(cnmhm, cmpo(s0, s1, cnlm, cnlm, cin(co(cv(s0), clmhm, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cnghm, cv(s1)))))
comment: Define a normed module homomorphism, also known as a bounded linear operator. This is a module homomorphism (a linear function) such that the operator norm is finite, or equivalently there is a constant ` c ` such that... (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2015.)
